alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 14 at 9:39PM CST until December 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Simpson and Copiah Counties. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Rockport. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Widespread flooding of low pastureland and bottomland is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 22.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Rockport 25.0 22.8 Wed 8 pm CST 23.2 20.5 19.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 900 AM CST.
